short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Displays your viewing time on websites.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Have you ever spent too much time on websites?
With this extension, your viewing time will be displayed in the bottom right, so you will easily notice wasted time.

Features:
- Shows viewing time in the bottom right.
- Changes color based on time.
- A sound will play every 10 seconds to keep you from wasting time.
- Variety of settings.
- Analytics to show your daily viewing time.

Settings:
- Add websites to the list.
- Change the threshold for color change.

Permissions:
- Storage: Required to save your settings.

Created by Tozaburo
